functions.shape module¶

SHAPE ESTIMATION ROUTINES

This module contains methods and classes for estimating galaxy shapes.

Module author: Samuel Farrens <samuel.farrens@gmail.com>

Notes

Some of the methods in this module are based on work by Fred Ngole.

References

[C2013]Cropper et al., Defining a Weak Lensing Experiment in Space, 2013, MNRAS, 431, 3103C. [https://arxiv.org/abs/1210.7691]
[BM2007]Baker and Moallem, Iteratively weighted centroiding for Shack-Hartman wave-front sensors, 2007n, Optics Express, 15, 8, 5147. [https://www.osapublishing.org/oe/abstract.cfm?uri=oe-15-8-5147]
